segments.text: I see the boy is really determined to get those cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on his tiptoes, reaching as high as he can, but that stool looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is being so patient, waiting for her turn, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water from the sink has made a big puddle on the floor, and it's getting bigger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware of what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to reach the cookies any second now, but I'm afraid he might fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm, it's a stark contrast to the scene inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees what's going on, before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching now, the stool is wobbling dangerously, and the girl is watching him closely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the girl will try to help her brother if he starts to fall, or if she'll just watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still overflowing, and it's going to cause a big mess if it's not stopped soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed any of this yet, she's just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
